meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Maggie Millikan Gabe Gales Padraic Scanlan Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6638.

td.p: Maggie Millikan, a homemaker from Midlothian, Virginia
Gabe Gales, a research analyst from Cincinnati, Ohio
Padraic Scanlan, a Ph.D. student in history originally from Montreal, Quebec, Canada (whose 1-day cash winnings total $11,400)

tr.td: ANAGRAMMED VIRGINIA PLACES
RED ALERT
ON THE TUBE
MIDDLE "W"
(Alex: The letter W will come up in the middle of each correct response.)
STUPID ANSWERS
YOU MUST BE PRESIDENT TO WIN

div.onmouseout:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Its colonial heritage has been preserved:
SWAMI BILL RUG')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td:
Its colonial heritage has been preserved:
SWAMI BILL RUG
